sentences.sentence: Halloween is the gaudiest example of the infantilization of the American culture.
sentences.translation: 万圣节是美国文化不成熟最俗丽的表现。

sentences.sentence: How this plumage evolved is no mystery: he healthiest males usually have the most spectacular plumage, so females choose whichever male has the gaudiest feathers.
sentences.translation: 最健康的雄性往往拥有最炫目的羽毛，所以雌性会选择有着最绚丽羽毛的雄性极乐鸟。

sentences.sentence: How this plumage evolved is no mystery: the healthiest males usually have the most spectacular plumage, so females choose whichever male has the gaudiest feathers.
sentences.translation: 它是怎么进化成这样的并不神秘：最强壮的雄性拥有最美丽的羽毛，所以雌性会选择那些拥有最华而不实的羽毛的雄性。
